snippet: If team owners cannot agree on a replacement for Bud Selig, the baseball commissioner, and a sense of chaos looms, perhaps Selig could be persuaded to change his mind about retiring.
abstract: Rob Manfred, Tom Werner and Tim Brosnan, three candidates running to replace Bud Selig as baseball commissioner, make 50-minute presentations to team owners and various baseball executives in private; contest to succeed Selig has inspired back-room bad-mouthing nasty enough to make even hardened politicians wince.
lead_paragraph: If team owners cannot agree on a replacement for Bud Selig, the baseball commissioner, and a sense of chaos looms, perhaps Selig could be persuaded to change his mind about retiring.

headline.seo: M.L.B. Commissioner Candidates Present Their Cases
headline.main: Back-Room Bickering Before the Final Say
headline.print_headline: Back-Room Bickering Before the Final Say
